par.name: n
par.note: Int - Number of times f is called

par.name: f
par.note: Func - Function to execute (can accept an index value from 0 to n-1)

par.name: s
par.note: Int - Start index (0 if null or not present)

rev.author: mf
rev.note: I put 's' as the last param, similar to Daniel's other iteration functions.
